page.title: 09PUBLIC & COMMUNITY SERVICES
page.content: HOSPITALS:15 bedded,GPcottage hospital nursing staff of 20. Minor casualty dept-limited Xrays.Outpatients-chirop- ody,eye, psychiatric, family planning, speech therapy, cytology, childhealth, antenatal,relaxation,postnatal,gynaec- ological,dietition,paediatric. POSTAL SERVICE: Gloucs Rd,sub-offices Weston, Pontshill&Brookend St. Staff:l Master, 1classD,26fulltime men,1parttime woman 4full &1part time counter.Vehicles:17 vans,1truck,4cycles.Handle upto Â£60000 per a.m.;in4 weeks Â£11000 stamps sold. 300 van calls(rural),450cycle & foot calls(town).Adverts,election,datapost, registered & recorded deliveries.Coun- ter services:pensions,allowances,lice- nces,waterates,TVstamps,travellers ch- eques,Passports,stationery,stamps;giro bank & savings agency.TELEPHONES:dena- tionalised l985-BRITISH TELECOM.Unmann ed exchange.CHURCHES:5 denominations.
